definitions.title: prep.
definitions.body: after (Cappad. and Eg. Aram. [[אחר]] afterwards (Lzb Eph.i. 361 S-C pap C 8), prob. Nab. [[אחר]] after (Lzb:212 SAC:16); Eg. Aram. [[אחריכם]] (S-C Pap. c 8+); Targum (sts.) [[אֲחוֹרֵי]]; BH [[אַחַר]]);—[[אַחֲרֵי דְנׇה]] after this Da 2:29, Da 2:45; c. sf. [[אַחֲרֵיהׂן]] Da 7:24. Usu. Aram. syn. [[בָּאתַר]], q. v. p. 1083
